languages.text: "Потому что познания Эмелины — как те архивы, которые ты собрался уничтожить. Слишком опасны, чтобы к ним прикасаться".
"Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."
languages.original_text: "Потому что познания Эмелины — как те архивы, которые ты собрался уничтожить. Слишком опасны, чтобы к ним прикасаться".

traits.locale_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."
"Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."
"Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."
"Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

languages.text: “因为艾米莉娜掌握的知识，和你打算销毁的那些资料一样。接触这些知识实在是太危险了。”
languages.original_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

traits.locale_text: “因为艾米莉娜掌握的知识，和你打算销毁的那些资料一样。接触这些知识实在是太危险了。”

languages.text: «Porque el saber de Emelina es igual que los archivos que pensaba destruir. Entrar en contacto con él es un gran riesgo».
languages.original_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

traits.locale_text: «Porque el saber de Emelina es igual que los archivos que pensaba destruir. Entrar en contacto con él es un gran riesgo».

languages.text: 「なぜなら、エメリナの知識はお前が破壊しようとしていたアーカイブと同じだからだ。接触するのは、あまりにも危険だ」
languages.original_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜなら、エメリナの知識はお前が破壊しようとしていたアーカイブと同じだからだ。接触するのは、あまりにも危険だ」

languages.text: « Parce que les connaissances d'Emelina sont similaires aux archives que vous comptiez détruire. Entrer en contact avec elles est bien trop dangereux. »
languages.original_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que les connaissances d'Emelina sont similaires aux archives que vous comptiez détruire. Entrer en contact avec elles est bien trop dangereux. »

languages.text: "Weil Emelinas Wissen nichts anderes ist als die Archive, die Ihr zerstören wolltet. Jeder Kontakt mit ihnen ist zu gefährlich."
languages.original_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Weil Emelinas Wissen nichts anderes ist als die Archive, die Ihr zerstören wolltet. Jeder Kontakt mit ihnen ist zu gefährlich."

languages.text: "Çünkü Emelina'nın bilgi birikimi, yok etmeyi planladığın arşivler gibi. Etkileşime girmek çok tehlikeli."
languages.original_text: "Because Emelina's knowledge is just like the archives you were planning to destroy. Coming into contact with it is too dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü Emelina'nın sahip olduğu bilgiler, aynı yok etmeyi planladığın arşivler gibi. Onunla etkileşime girmek çok tehlikeli."
